verses.verse: O Lord <WH3068>, rebuke <WH3198> me not in your anger <WH639>, neither chasten <WH3256> me in your hot displeasure <WH2534>.
Have mercy <WH2603> upon me <WH3068>, O Lord; for I am weak <WH536>: O Lord <WH3068>, heal <WH7495> me <WH6106>; for my bones are troubled <WH926>.
My soul <WH5315> is also severely <WH3966> troubled <WH926>: but you <WH3068>, O Lord, how long?
Return <WH7725>, O Lord <WH3068>, deliver <WH2502> my soul <WH5315>: oh save <WH3467> me for your mercies <WH2617>' sake.
For in death <WH4194> there is no memory <WH2143> of you <WH7585>: in the grave who shall give you thanks <WH3034>?
I am weary <WH3021> with my groaning <WH585>; all the night <WH3915> make I my bed <WH4296> to swim <WH7811>; I water <WH4529> my couch <WH6210> with my tears <WH1832>.
My eye <WH5869> is consumed <WH6244> because of grief <WH3708>; it waxes old <WH6275> because of all my enemies <WH6887>.
Depart <WH5493> from me <WH6466>, all you workers of iniquity <WH205>; for the Lord <WH3068> has heard <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of my weeping <WH1065>.
The Lord <WH3068> has heard <WH8085> my supplication <WH8467>; the Lord <WH3068> will receive <WH3947> my prayer <WH8605>.
Let all my enemies <WH341> be ashamed <WH954> and severe <WH3966> troubled <WH926>: let them return <WH7725> and be ashamed <WH954> suddenly <WH7281>.
